title: [多线] 冒险魔法——丨寻找巧克力丨神秘丨暮色丨圣遗物丨陨石丨竹丨饮水丨[1.7.10]
author: yuezimeizi123
txt_content:
本帖最后由 yuezimeizi123 于 2018-6-28 20:54 编辑 
云の彼端————欢迎你的加入————
前言：
群内成员都很友善 一直都是以温馨和谐为主题的发展~
喜欢这个mod又喜欢一种温暖的氛围
——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————  
服务器景色：               
主城：



建筑：




















大合照：

服务器特色：成就解锁物品栏
每解锁一个成就可以开一个物品栏格子（有暮色很容易的嘿嘿）———————————————————————————————————————————
云の彼端规章制度
①禁止作出类似安利游戏的行为
②禁止辱骂或者非点名性嘲讽
③禁止撕逼要撕逼自己私聊小窗
④禁止在别的服务器宣传本服
⑤禁止发过大图片以及刷表情包
⑥不会的可以问管理员服主，有问题可以私聊服主解决
⑦服务器很容易获得称号（雾）
最最最重要的事情就是管理好个人言行
玩家有义务维持群内的基本活力与秩序
——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
服务器mod和插件：
mod列表：寻找巧克力，神秘，暮色，圣遗物，传奇工具②，NPC,精英怪，陨石，饮水，竹、更多生物、成就解锁物品栏    
插件：地皮、清道夫、结婚、灵魂绑定、登录强制传送——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
OP证明：

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————
感谢各位能耐心的看完，谢谢各位的长期支持与鼓

replies.txt_content: 要进群才可以下客户端哟~

replies.txt_content: 感谢各位多多的支持。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 每日一顶

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 每日一顶

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 其实我的心都是酥的。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你那么爱他，为什么不把他留下。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 迷人如爱 沉默在深秋。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你说什么爱情都会变。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 没那么简单 就能找到 聊得来的伴。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 其实我是很讨厌熊孩子。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 如果他真的是喜欢你那么为什么他不会来主动找你。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 本来昨天还没这么痛的。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 每日一顶

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 每日一顶

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 好不容易， 最后用了一颗炽热的心去拥抱了一颗冷淡的心。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你说什么爱情都会变，你说我不要再被别人骗。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 感觉还是很累，一个人出去旅游虽然会孤单，总比喧嚣的开心。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你不知道我为什么离开你，我坚持不能说放任你哭泣。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 别来无恙 ，只有你还在身旁。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 每日一顶

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 如果当初我说了，那么就没有后来了。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 仿佛还看见昨天那张悲伤的脸庞。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 看过黄昏追逐黎明，我知道美丽会老去。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 门前老树张新芽，院儿里枯木又开花。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 最终吧，还是决定要放弃掉了所有，再见。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 最近天冷，各位还是应当多多加衣。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 好想再回到那些年的时光。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 每日一顶

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content:
我决定不再陪着你了，
也决定不再喜欢你了。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 然后我真的想放弃喜欢你了，真的很累。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 爱我别走，如果你说~你不爱我。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: π_π喵的咪，都没人儿加群阿，麻蛋我心好累！

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 别来无恙，你在心上。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 春田花花幼稚园 ，这名字也真是可爱。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 爱让我们变的比单身愚笨。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: (??ω?`)听说这里没有十五个字？

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 她静悄悄地来过，她慢慢带走沉默。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 西湖的水，我的泪，我宁愿和你化作一团火焰 阿阿阿~

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 沉迷Mc无法自拔~~~！

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你说你也难过我不相信。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 熊孩必须死，有多少我要杀多少。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 传说中你为爱甘心被搁浅，我也可以为你潜入海里面。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你问我爱你有多深 爱你有几分。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 实现了真的渴望才能算到过了天堂。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 无奈重遇那天存在永远。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你们都不爱Mc了，那也罢了，Mc爱我，我爱Mc。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你说我爱你你都不相信。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 人群中哭着 你只想变成透明的颜色。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你再也不会梦，或痛，或心动了。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 我站在你左侧 却像隔着银河。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 小学 小学 怎么辣么多小学生。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 清者自清，浊者自浊。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 哪个更值得，恋恋不舍。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 我站在你左侧，却像隔着银河。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 万恶的吧阿， 你吃枣药丸。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 看不见你的笑我怎么睡得着。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 从前从前 有个人爱你很久 。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 如果这是最后的结局    为何我还忘不了你

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 丑八怪噫哎噫哎噫哎

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 是否要逼人弃了甲  亮出一条伤疤   不堪的根源在哪

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 在哪里 在哪里见过你~你笑的好甜蜜。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 你再也不会梦 或痛 或心动了。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 我不知道说什么好这条消息没有十五字。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 困吗困吗，我很困阿你困不困阿。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 现在在吃鸡柳，怕等会是吃不下饭了。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 没有地球太阳还是会绕，没有理由我也能自己走。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 可惜即将各在一方 只好深深把这刻尽凝望。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 没有地球，太阳还是会绕。没有理由我也可以自己走。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 十五字十五字十五字十五字十五字。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: =-=据说这一段文字没有十五个字你信不信。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 一群嗜血的蚂蚁，嗷呜嗷呜嗷呜呜呜呜呜呜呜呜

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 哪个更值得~一错 再错~~~~~~~~~

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 就是给你喝的你是不是傻阿还有一瓶是我喝的阿。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: (??ω?`)写了这么久的歌词阿我都不知道接下来要写什么好呢。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 虽然说我不知道我是在写什么，但是姑且来说算是在顶贴吧。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 说起来我都不知道这个要不要求十五个字。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 害人之心不可有，防人之心不可无。

replies.author: yuezimeizi123
replies.txt_content: 把你的灵魂关在永远锁上的躯壳。
